name: AMERICAN BENEFITS COUNCIL
sampleDescriptions: Proposals related to retirement plan enhancements. Proposals relating to defined benefit plans, including plan funding and multiemployer plan issues. Issues related to tax incentives for retirement savings. Proposals related to stemming leakage from retirement plans through reform of plan loan rules. Proposals related to stable value investment offerings in defined contribution plans. Proposals related to phased retirement. Proposals to increase PBGC premiums. Proposals related to retirement target date funds. Issues related to the Department of Labor's proposed regulation defining fiduciary for investment advice purposes. Proposals and regulations related to cash balance, pension equity, and other hybrid pension plans. Issues related to PBGC collections and PBGC disclosure and mediation issues. Proposals related to electronic disclosure of information under ERISA. Proposals regarding compliance of retirement plans. Issues related to use of brokerage windows in defined contribution plans. Proposals to reform the multiple employer plan rules. Proposals to modify required minimum distribution rules. Proposals that would modify limits on retirement plan contributions. Proposals related to stretch IRAs. Issues related to access to death master file. Issues related to government issued mortality tables. Proposals to amend the nondiscrimination provisions to protect older, longer service employees. Issues related to swap, margin, and capital rules. State-administered retirement plan initiatives. Annuitization with respect to defined benefit plans. QLACs. Effects of corporate integration on retirement plans. Proposals that would consolidate various retirement and IRA types. Proposals to create a retirement lost and found. Kids Savings Accounts. Proposals related to "Rothification". Proposals related to the establishment of savings accounts for emergencies. H.R. 3910, to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make lifetime income and managed account options of defined contribution retirement savings plans portable. H.R. 4610, the RETIRE Act. H.R. 4158, the Retirement Plan Modernization Act. H.R. 4523, the Automatic Retirement Plan. H.R. 4524, the Retirement Plan Simplification and Enhancement Act. S. 2474, Retirement Savings Lost and Found Act. Proposals related to disaster relief. Issues related to P.L. 115-97. S. 2526/H.R. 5282, Retirement Enhancement and Savings Act. H.R. 1625, Consolidated Appropriations Act.

H.R. 4158, the Retirement Plan Modernization Act. H.R. 4523, the Automatic Retirement Plan. H.R. 4524, the Retirement Plan Simplification and Enhancement Act. S. 2474, Retirement Savings Lost and Found Act. Proposals related to disaster relief. Issues related to P.L. 115-97. S. 2526/H.R. 5282, Retirement Enhancement and Savings Act.

Proposals related to retirement plan enhancements. Proposals relating to defined benefit plans, including plan funding and multiemployer plan issues. Issues related to tax incentives for retirement savings. Issues related to electronic notarization. Proposals related to environmental, social, and governance plan investments and proxy voting. Proposals related to stemming leakage from retirement plans through reform of plan loan rules. Proposals related to stable value investment offerings in defined contribution plans. Proposals related to phased retirement. Proposals to increase PBGC premiums. Proposals related to retirement target date funds. Issues related to the Department of Labor's proposed regulation defining fiduciary for investment advice purposes. Proposals and regulations related to cash balance, pension equity, and other hybrid pension plans. Issues related to PBGC collections and PBGC disclosure and mediation issues. Proposals related to electronic disclosure of information under ERISA. Proposals regarding compliance of retirement plans. Issues related to Form 5500 filing and missing participants. Issues related to the use of brokerage windows in defined contribution plans. Proposals to reform the multiple employer plan rules. Proposals to modify required minimum distribution rules. Proposals that would modify limits on retirement plan contributions. Proposals related to stretch IRAs. Issues related to access to death master file. Issues related to government issued mortality tables. Proposals to amend the nondiscrimination provisions to protect older, longer service employees. Issues related to swap, margin, and capital rules. State-administered retirement plan initiatives. Annuitization with respect to defined benefit plans. QLACs. Effects of corporate integration on retirement plans. Proposals that would consolidate various retirement and IRA types. Proposals to create a retirement lost and found. Child Savings Accounts. Proposals related to the establishment of savings accounts for emergencies. Proposals related to disaster relief. H.R. 4523, the Automatic Retirement Plan Act (115th Congress).  Proposals related to self-correcting inadvertent plan errors. H.R. 1439, Increasing Access to a Secure Retirement Act (116th Congress). S. 322, SIMPLE Plan Modernization Act (116th Congress). H.R. 1084, Family Savings Act (116th Congress). S. 1428, Retirement Parity for Student Loans Act (116th Congress). S. 1431, Retirement Security and Savings Act (116th Congress). S. 2370, Automatic IRA Act (116th Congress). S. 4192/H.R. 7439, Retirement Savings Lost and Found Act (116th Congress). S. 3814, RESTART Act (116th Congress). S. 5064, A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase retirement savings, to improve retirement plan administration (116th Congress). H.R. 8696, Securing A Strong Retirement Act (116th Congress). H.R. 8606, To defer the tax of certain sales of employer stock and reduce certain retirement-related excise taxes (116th Congress). H.R. 409/H.R. 423, Emergency Pension Plan Relief Act. H.R. 1319, the American Rescue Plan Act.
